label: S2) Type string, expression: empty
description: The property will NOT be evaluated as an expression.

label: S3) Type string, expression: always
description: The property will always be evaluated as an expression.

label: S4) Type string, expression: optional
description: The property will only be evaluated as an expression if a = sign is leading the expression.
remarks: Does not work properly if you have defined a default value.

label: S5) Type string, maxLength: 10, expression: undefined
S6) Type string, maxLength: 10, expression: optional
